name: Chicken Tortilla Soup
author: ladyw4kids
summary: Bring a bit of the Southwest to your table with this spirit-warming soup. Loaded with tender chicken, diced tomatoes, and plenty of seasonings, it's sure to be requested again and again. Serve with tortilla chips if desired.
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers
1 ½ pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cubed
¼ cup shredded Mexican cheese blend
directions: Combine onion, chicken broth, tomatoes, and   in a large sauce pan; bring to a boil over medium heat
Stir in chicken; reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until chicken is no longer pink, 4 to 6 minutes
Mix cornstarch and water in a small bowl until smooth; gradually stir into soup
Bring soup to a boil over medium-high heat; cook, stirring occasionally, until thickened, about 1 minute
Top with Mexican cheese and cilantro
